name: RED BUMBLEBEE GAIDEN
description:
Game made in 7 days for the Bullet Hell Jam! Click the thingy on the right of the site for details

Known issues:
-Boss doesn't spawn after frog if you just continued. Try playing the game again if after more than 10 seconds of killing the frog nothing happens.

The Sea of Japan has been overtaken by Kaijus... AGAIN?!

It’s up to Captain Kurosawa, the brave pilot of the「Red Bumblebee」to protect Japan from the incoming Kaiju threat!

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Z to shoot
Shift to focus
Esc to pause (buggy)
Alt+Enter to fullscreen
